None.Name: Necro Explosion
None.Description:
Activate to gather up
to 2600 life points from corpses within a
20m radius around the caster to create
a huge nether sphere that explodes after
2 seconds dealing the corpses former
maximum life points as area damage to
hostile and friendly entities. Up to 25%
of the gathered life points are dealt as
damage per target. Affects ground
targets only. Knocks back small units.
Reusable every 10 seconds.

None.Name: Revenant's Doom
None.Description:
Activate to bestow
the unit with a curse that will make it
resurrect in case it dies. The
resurrected revenant will only be a
shadow of its former self but it will be
endowed with the same abilities and
equal in strength. After 20 seconds the
revenant will then die once and for all.
May only be triggered once.

None.Name: Blast
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, unit delivers a nether blast that deals 80 damage to enemies in a 15m radius, up to 120 in total.
